amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit any funds authorized in the bill from being used by the military service academies to discriminate on the basis of race or ethnicity in academy admissions or to establish quotas for admission on the basis of race or ethnicity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Banks.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 325).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
